description: Variation of conditions 1 and 5 of planning permission dated 29 January 2019 (18/09864/FULL) (which varied condition 1 of planning permission dated 16 August 2017 (17/05419/FULL)) for demolition of the existing building and redevelopment comprising erection of 2 x 2-bed dwellings (Class C3) each of ground, first and mansard roof levels with roof lights at main roof level and walk-on roof lights at rear first floor level to create external terraces; Namely, insertion of rear lightwell within the approved rear terrace down to basement level, insertion of timber screening between units, minor changes to approved rear terrace including relocation of approved AC units and removal of approved rooflights, slight alteration to roof form and minor relocation of approved rooflights, minor changes to approved front and rear elevation fenestration and reconfiguration of internal layouts to provide 2 x 3-bed dwellings (class C3). Amendment is also sought to the wording of condition 5 (Code of Construction Practice) as details pursuant to the condition have been discharged.
